comments.comment:
Thanks for the bug report. I am, however, having difficulty reproducing this with the example app in trunk (I sent hl.fl=<nothing>, hl.fl=<space>, and omitting hl.fl entirely).

Could you provide more details on how to reproduce this with the example app?

ok

<add>
